graphics

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • graphics.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Camera
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Represents the viewable area of the world, the camera follows the position of the player. Once sprites within the viewable area are drawn.
    Author:
    Andrew J. Rigg, Cameron A. Craig, Euan Mutch, Duncan Robertson, Stuart Thain
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
